titles.title: A bill to amend the Head Start Act to permit some teachers in Early Head Start programs to teach while earning a child development associate credential.
A bill to amend the Head Start Act to permit some teachers in Early Head Start programs to teach while earning a child development associate credential.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
